# nodeNeverEscapeContents | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ XMLNode ](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode)

- [ XMLNode.Options ](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options)

- [ nodeNeverEscapeContents ](/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeNeverEscapeContents)

- [ XMLNode ](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode)

- [ XMLNode.Options ](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options)

-  nodeNeverEscapeContents 

Type Property# nodeNeverEscapeContents

Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+

```
static var nodeNeverEscapeContents: XMLNode.Options { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeNeverEscapeContents#Discussion)

Requests that NSXML does not escape the reserved characters `<` and `&` in text nodes.

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeNeverEscapeContents#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/Options/nodeNeverEscapeContents#Constants)

[`static var documentIncludeContentTypeDeclaration: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/documentincludecontenttypedeclaration)Includes a content type declaration for HTML or XHTML in the output of the document.[`static var documentTidyHTML: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/documenttidyhtml)Formats HTML into valid XHTML during processing of the document.[`static var documentTidyXML: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/documenttidyxml)Changes malformed XML into valid XML during processing of the document.[`static var documentValidate: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/documentvalidate)Validates this document against its DTD (internal or external) or XML Schema.[`static var documentXInclude: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/documentxinclude)Replaces all XInclude nodes in the document with the nodes referred to.[`static var nodeCompactEmptyElement: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodecompactemptyelement)Requests that an element should be contracted when empty; for example, `<flag/>`.[`static var nodeExpandEmptyElement: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodeexpandemptyelement)Requests that an element should be expanded when empty; for example, `<flag></flag>`. This is the default.[`static var nodeIsCDATA: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodeiscdata)Specifies that a text node contains and is written out as a CDATA section.[`static var nodeLoadExternalEntitiesAlways: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodeloadexternalentitiesalways)Requests that external entities are always loaded.[`static var nodeLoadExternalEntitiesNever: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodeloadexternalentitiesnever)Requests that external entities are never loaded.[`static var nodeLoadExternalEntitiesSameOriginOnly: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodeloadexternalentitiessameoriginonly)Requests that external entities are always loaded and only applies when a URL has been provided.[`static var nodePreserveAll: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodepreserveall)[`static var nodePreserveAttributeOrder: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodepreserveattributeorder)Requests that NSXMLNode preserve the order of attributes as in the source XML.[`static var nodePreserveCDATA: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodepreservecdata)Requests that NSXMLNode preserve CDATA blocks where defined in the input XML.[`static var nodePreserveCharacterReferences: XMLNode.Options`](/documentation/foundation/xmlnode/options/nodepreservecharacterreferences)Specifies that character references (`&#`*nnn*`;`) should not be resolved for XML output of this node.
